## Avatar.tick() method

Processes called periodically

**Signature:**

```typescript
tick(deltaTime: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  deltaTime | number |  |

**Returns:**

void

## Example


```ts
const clock = new THREE.Clock();
renderer.setAnimationLoop(() => {
  const dt = clock.getDelta();
  avatar.tick(dt);
});
```
or

```ts
const clock = new THREE.Clock();
setInterval(() => {
  const dt = clock.getDelta();
  avatar.tick(dt);
}, anything);
```
